text: Suceta raho badagi alaha la'i hi sobhanika hai ate jinham lokam ne usa tom' binham hora saha'ika bana rakhe hana ki asim tam unham di ibadata sirafa isa la'i karade ham ki uha sanu alaha de nere kara denage. Besaka alaha unham vicakara usa gala da faisala kara devega jinham la'i iha vakharevem kara rahe hana. Alaha ajihe bade nu caga raha nahim bakhasada, jihara jhutha hove ate saca nu na manana vala hove
